content.raw: No probs - I only came across it by chance - was using an incompatible set of versions of things such that BLACS ended up importing PySide and then qtutils (and then crashing). But, since it led me to the above link about the differences between the API, reading through that gave me some confidence that qtutils.qt ought to decently wrap PySide as it is (after fixing this issue).
content.html: No probs - I only came across it by chance - was using an incompatible set of versions of things such that BLACS ended up importing PySide and then qtutils (and then crashing). But, since it led me to the above link about the differences between the API, reading through that gave me some confidence that qtutils.qt ought to decently wrap PySide as it is (after fixing this issue).
